definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: Tonight's edition demystifies the how and why of television ratings.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的節目闡明瞭計算電視收視率的辦法和原因。

sentences.english: In all-day viewing, Fox News rose 26 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在全天收視率調查中，福克斯新聞上升26%。

sentences.english: But in recent years, TV cartoons have been declining in viewership.
sentences.chinese: 但是最近幾年，電視動畫片的收視率不斷下降。

sentences.english: Programs will do almost anything for good ratings.
sentences.chinese: 各個節目爲了高的收視率，幾乎不擇手段。

sentences.english: And Big Bang already is the highest-rated scripted series on television.
sentences.chinese: 而《生活大爆炸》已經是高收視率的電視劇。

sentences.english: Larry's ratings are massively down year on year - and Piers is just the chap.
sentences.chinese: 拉里的收視率一年不如一年，而皮爾斯要尋找的人。

sentences.english: The networks reportedly are basing ratings boosts on suspect data.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，電視網都是依靠虛假的數據來拉動收視率的。

sentences.english: Minutes spent in front of the computer are minutes lost to television ratings.
sentences.chinese: 在電腦前面花的時間必然是電視節目收視率的損失。

sentences.english: But she had also realized that the viability of a cover story had nothing to do with how high a show's ratings were.
sentences.chinese: 但她也認識到，封面故事與節目的高收視率沒有關係。

sentences.english: In order to get higher ratings, some media outlets even create false news.
sentences.chinese: 還有些媒體爲了收視率，甚至製造假新聞。

sentences.english: The state-sponsored performance, which airs Sunday, annually rates as one of China's most-watched shows.
sentences.chinese: 每年的春節晚會都是中國收視率最高的節目之一。

sentences.english: So, a large number of young audiences embrace the teleplay unlikelihood with high viewing rate wholesale.
sentences.chinese: 所以，收視率高的電視劇未必有大量年輕觀衆擁躉。

sentences.english: It is true that television programs concerning personal lives of celebrities always receive the highest audience rating.
sentences.chinese: 有關名人私生活的電視節目的確總能獲得高收視率。

sentences.english: Buy the lowest "price" from top-rated stores the best products at a time.
sentences.chinese: 買在最低價格從收視率最高的商店最好的產品每一次。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the ratings for Bonds's reality show were miserable.
sentences.chinese: 同時，邦茲的真人秀節目收視率慘敗。

sentences.english: The highest-rated comedy on television may be on the move.
sentences.chinese: 收視率最高的喜劇可能要換播出時間了。

definition: iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
large-scale Chinese opera/Beijing opera/major dramatic production (movie, TV series etc)
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
a shout/fig. opinion or demand, esp. expressed by a group
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
cast and crew/performers and production team
